ssl.keystore: <PEM bundle of certificate and PKCS#8 password-protected private key>

keys.userId: <HMAC key used to protect the userId, should be 32 random bytes>
keys.pii: <PII data symmetric encryption key, must be 32 random bytes>
keys.userToken: <HMAC key used to generate a user token, should be 32 random bytes>
keys.actionToken: <HMAC key used to generate an action token, should be 32 random bytes>

defaultLanguage: <default language in format ll-CC, e.g. en-US, fr-FR, fr-CA>

email.provider: <email service provider, only "gmail" and "smtp" are supported>
